title: 纯原版崩溃
author: feihukele
txt_content:
纯原版官方启动器启动1.13.0版本，游戏崩溃
提示是
The game crashed whilst mouseclicked event handler
Error: java.lang.IllegalStateException: failed to create a child event loop

这是什么问题

replies.author: handongyang521
replies.txt_content: 换个客户端，你这个客户端有缺陷，除非找懂的人来修，麻烦给最佳

replies.author: 冷瞳世界
replies.txt_content: java问题，解决方法①换客户端，我这里有最新客户端

replies.author: 冷瞳世界
replies.txt_content: ②尝试更换java③加我QQ，详细给截图1784954659
